trans-unit.source: Disconnects the server end of a named pipe instance from a client process

seg-source.mrk: Disconnects the server end of a named pipe instance from a client process

target.mrk: Disconnects the server end of a named pipe instance from a client process

trans-unit.source: Handle to the server end of a named pipe instance.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the server end of a named pipe instance.

target.mrk: Handle to the server end of a named pipe instance.

trans-unit.source: If the client end of the named pipe is open, the DisconnectNamedPipe function forces that end of the named pipe closed.

seg-source.mrk: If the client end of the named pipe is open, the DisconnectNamedPipe function forces that end of the named pipe closed.

target.mrk: If the client end of the named pipe is open, the DisconnectNamedPipe function forces that end of the named pipe closed.

trans-unit.source: The client receives an error the next time it attempts to access the pipe.

seg-source.mrk: The client receives an error the next time it attempts to access the pipe.

target.mrk: The client receives an error the next time it attempts to access the pipe.

trans-unit.source: A client that is forced off a pipe must still use the CloseHandle function to close its end of the pipe.

seg-source.mrk: A client that is forced off a pipe must still use the CloseHandle function to close its end of the pipe.

target.mrk: A client that is forced off a pipe must still use the CloseHandle function to close its end of the pipe.
